thread.title: LaMelo Ball got juked out of shoes in playoff game
thread.title_full: LaMelo Ball got juked out of shoes in playoff game

title: LaMelo Ball got juked out of shoes in playoff game
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email LaMelo Ball got juked out of shoes in playoff game LaMelo Ball was put on skates. Post to Facebook LaMelo Ball got juked out of shoes in playoff game LaMelo Ball was put on skates.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/ucla-commit-lamelo-ball-defense-chino-hills-high-school-basketball-ankles-broken/   LaMelo Ball got juked out of shoes in playoff game Andrew Joseph 7:17 p.m. ET Feb. 23, 2017 
LaMelo Ball, the younger brother of UCLA's Lonzo Ball, broke onto the national scene this season after calling his shot from midcourt and later scoring 92 points in a high school game. 
It became clearly evident that Ball's remarkable 92-point performance was made possible in part because he simply did not play defense for portions of the game. Well, during Wednesday's Chino Hills vs. Long Beach Poly (Calif.) playoff game, Ball did square up to play some defense. Then, this happened: + chino hills star Lamelo Ball drops 92 one game , but gets his ankles broken round 2 of the playoffs pic.twitter.com/liMb1h1YvB 
To be fair, it will be tough to find a basketball player who hasn't gotten their ankles broken on occasion. It just happened to be LaMelo's turn. 
Ball's Chino Hills team won, 98-74, and the sophomore scored 26 points. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/ucla-commit-lamelo-ball-defense-chino-hills-high-school-basketball-ankles-broken/ Most Popular
